# https://help.seafile.com/syncing_client/excluding_files/

# OS
.DS_Store
.directory
Thumbs.db
desktop.ini

# Python
__pycache__/
.venv/
*.pyc
.mypy_cache/
.pytest_cache/
.ruff_cache/

# Node.js
node_modules/

# direnv
.direnv/

# Ansible
.ansible/

# Temporary files generated by editor
*.swp
# tags # git 내부 폴더와 이름이 일치해서, 추가하면 안됨.

# Chromium-based
*.crdownload
.org.chromium.Chromium.*

# firefox
*.part

# LibreOffice
.~lock.*

# https://github.com/serokell/deploy-rs
.deploy-gc/

# vi:ft=gitignore
